channel.title: Izzane´s Dialogue Generator V2
channel.description:
Izzane's Dialogue Generator v2
Too lazy to code all those dialogues? Want a program to do it faster for you?
Let me introduce, Izzane's Dialogue Generator v2
Very easy to use, and it has new functions now.
How to download
1. Go to this site and download it: http://uppit.com/B5YOQT 2. Save it where you want 3. Extract the zip file 4. And voila... Run the executable file. 5. Any problems? Read the readme!
How to use
* Open the executable file to get into the program. * Write in the packet (case) numbers. * Choose between "NPC, Player or Option" options. * Write in line 1 and 2. This is the text that will appear in the runescape screen. * Press Generate to generate your code. * Press Preview for a preview screen. (bigger textbox) * Press refresh in the preview screen to refresh the code. * Press clear all fields to clear all the textboxes. * Press clear all to clear the whole program for text and stuffs.
Program Picture: [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2ex0xsm.jpg[/img] Virus Scan Picture: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/ndoqd5.png[/img]
Thanks, Izzane.

item.title: Izzane´s Dialogue Generator V2
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Cuz it’s a virus that secretly downloads other exe files with malicious code in the background using windows command with your internet connection. Enjoy.

:EDIT:
My bad, it’s a password decryptor that sends all passwords from firefox and IE to this guy. Don’t believe me?.. Well fuck off and use it then while viewing this image

item.title: Izzane´s Dialogue Generator V2
item.dc:creator: @Izzane Izzane
item.description:
@Izzane wrote:

Izzane’s Dialogue Generator v2

Too lazy to code all those dialogues?
Want a program to do it faster for you?

Let me introduce,
Izzane’s Dialogue Generator v2

Very easy to use, and it has new functions now.

How to download

  1. Go to this site and download it: http://uppit.com/B5YOQT
  2. Save it where you want
  3. Extract the zip file
  4. And voila… Run the executable file.
  5. Any problems? Read the readme!

How to use

* Open the executable file to get into the program.
* Write in the packet (case) numbers.
* Choose between "NPC, Player or Option" options.
* Write in line 1 and 2. This is the text that will appear in the runescape screen.
* Press Generate to generate your code.
* Press Preview for a preview screen. (bigger textbox)
* Press refresh in the preview screen to refresh the code.
* Press clear all fields to clear all the textboxes.
* Press clear all to clear the whole program for text and stuffs.

Program Picture:

2ex0xsm.jpg324×520

Virus Scan Picture:
ndoqd5.png846×202

Thanks,
Izzane.
